attributes.action: Start manufacturing the Land Rover Defender in the UK again.
attributes.background: This was one of the best British vehicles to have ever been produced. Its manufacturing was sadly stopped due to EU regulations.  UK should therefore use Britain’s departure from the EU to revive this great British vehicle.

rejection.details: This petition has been rejected because it is not about something which is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Any decision about whether to resume manufacturing the Land Rover Defender would be for company Jaguar Land Rover to take.
